text: ane a pahela tamari pase yusupha purava la'ine avya, to pana tame temana lavela (purava)mam sanka karata rahya, tyam sudhi ke jyare temanum mrtyu tha'i gayum to kaheva lagya, temana pachi allaha ko'i payagambarane mokalase ja nahim, avi ja rite allaha ta'ala te dareka vyaktine pathabhrasta kare che, je hada vatavi janara ane sanka karavavalo hoya
